name: EndStageRenalDiseaseConditionsSCT
title: End Stage Renal Disease Conditions SCT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains condition or diagnosis terms representing end stage renal disease),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a diagnosis of stage 5 chronic kidney disease and who have had a kidney transplant or are on renal dialysis),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes chronic kidney disease SNOMED CT diagnosis codes that represent end stage renal disease with renal dialysis or kidney transplant.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not representative of stage 5 chronic kidney disease with transplant or dialysis.)

contains.display: Chronic kidney disease stage 5 on dialysis (disorder)
Chronic kidney disease stage 5 with transplant (disorder)
